RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZ SENSE was away awkwardly from the outside post, went around the first turn in the four path, settled off the pace, was asked near the half-mile pole, gained in three path on the far turn as the field began to bunch, waited behind tiring horses coming to the five-sixteenths, was roused while finding room inside that pole, rallied in the two path into the stretch, made a bid at the three-sixteenths, shook clear coming to the furlong marker and drew away under strong urging. CLASSY MISCHIEF was hustled from the start then urged along in the three path on the first turn, settled off the pace, gained five wide on the far turn, made a bid outside the five-sixteenths, led briefly in upper stretch then lost the advantage to the winner and proved no match while just able to hold the place. BUCHU raced inside for most of the first turn then moved to the two path, settled off the pace, rallied four wide on the far turn, made a bid outside the five-sixteenths, led past the quarter-pole then lost the advantage in upper stretch and also proved no match for the winner then just missed the place. LIFE'S AN AUDIBLE was hustled from the gate, raced inside on the first turn, shifted out under urging entering the backstretch, tracked the leader, made a bid in the three path early on the far turn, led briefly outside the five-sixteenths, moved to the two path then the rail while dropping back late on that bend and tired. JUSTDENY was taken in hand while dropping from the two path to the rail on the first turn, moved closer outside the five-eighths, shifted from the rail to the three path under urging on the final turn and faltered. CAUSEWAY'S JEWEL went to the front, showed the way in the two path, was challenged on the far turn, lost the advantage inside the three-eighths pole and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Miz Sense
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Justdeny
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Pine Racing Stables and R A Hill Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VINTAGE coaxed from the gate, showed the way under rating until given a notch to work with at the nine-sixteenths and then slipped away to a safe lead, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, widened away and took the inside route into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive, then got ridden out to the finish. MAGGIE coaxed from the start, chased two then three wide, tipped out five wide near the three-eighths placed to coaxing, continued five wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on well clear of the rest to be along second best. SHIGEKO chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened while along for the show honors. JOEY THE FISH hustled from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing from the half mile pole, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, passed tired foes. OUR ROSIE DIAMONDS three then two wide in aim latched on while attending the leader early on down the backstretch before being shaken off with nine-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths giving chase, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. SAVE GRACE chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. PRANA coaxed from the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing half a mile from home, cut the corner into upper stretch, faltered in the drive. DASHING DELLA chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage
ENTRY.OWNER: Englehart Jeffrey S and Photos Finish LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, rated ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, drew clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jason Hall, Stephen Baker, and DavidBranch

ENTRY.NAME: Prana
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 1/2, cut corner, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Save Grace
ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael

ENTRY.NAME: Joey the Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2p, coaxed 1/2p, 4-5w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, tip 5w 3/8, 5w uppr, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Our Rosie Diamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w in aim, coaxed 5/16, shaken off, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dashing Della
ENTRY.OWNER: Wojdyla Randall S and JohLis Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 89. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it i nadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CERTIFIED LOVERBOY saved ground on the first turn, was well placed while rated just off the pace, moved from the rail to the three path under urging on the far turn, gained six wide into the stretch, took the lead at the three-sixteenths, shook clear inside the furlong marker and proved best under steady urging. SEDONA RED raced in the four path on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid with a half-mile to run, vied in the two path on the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch, fought with the winner to near the furlong marker and was outfinished while well clear for the place. ATLANTIC DANCER raced three wide on the first turn, settled at the rear, was urged three wide early on the far turn then shifted five wide while advancing, turned into upper stretch under a drive and was along for the show. PAXSATIONAL went to the front, dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, was given his cue late on that bend, spun into the stretch in the two path then lost the advantage, dropped back into the final furlong and gave way. WAR OFFICER broke a bit slow then was taken up, saved ground going around the opening bend, settled near the back, was urged along in the two path on the far turn and was no factor. ARRO SMASH was caught seven wide for most of the first turn, dropped to the four path late on that bend, settled comfortably off the pace, was urged while inside to the two path on the final turn and failed to respond. FLY RIGHT brushed with a foe early, raced in the five path on the first turn, settled just off the pace on the outside, chased three then four wide on the far turn and retreated. KOOPS brushed with a rival early, was caught in the six path on the first turn, settled outside on the backstretch, came up empty in the four path on the far turn, floated six wide into the stretch and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Certified Loverboy
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Twin Sports Racing Brown Road Racing Russell Ken and Adelp

ENTRY.NAME: War Officer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,tkn up,ins1st,near back,2p2nd turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Sedona Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Palmer Teresa and Palmer David J

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OBRIGADA five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn and advanced strongly on the vying trio to overhaul the leader just prior to swinging four wide into upper stretch, came under brief and light hand urging straightened away, went clear being flashed the crop to the right side and prevailed comfortably at the end. ICY REPLY vied from the four path with a pair down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn and began to shake off those rivals tucking briefly two wide at the five-sixteenths, came under coaxing under challenge from the top one to the outside and was headed for the front just before spinning three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to safely secure the place honors. DOLCE SERA got pinched out between foes just after the start, chased four then three wide before tucking inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and kept on to procure the show honors. CHAMPAGNE POETRY vied three then two wide between foes coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch dropping back, weakened to the finish but had enough to best two rivals to garner the last major share in the final jumps. GRACEFUL ROSE came out just after the start pinching out DOLCE SERA in tandem with CHAMPAGNE POETRY, chased three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened. CARBON coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide briefly before tipping four wide, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened. LIBERTY FLAME broke out at the start and came under coaxing to vie from the two path inside a pair of rivals, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, got shaken off five-sixteenths from home, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2-3w early, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Flame
ENTRY.OWNER: Begg James Bentley and Upland Flats Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, coaxed, vied 2p w/ pair, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Graceful Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out after st, chased 3w, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dolce Sera
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched after st, chased 4-3w, ins turn, ins 1/4, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Champagne Poetry
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club and Dark Horse Racing Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Obrigada
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w backstretch, 4w turn, advanced, up 4w uppr, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Reply
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4p, 3-2w turn, coaxed near 1/4, headed 3w upper, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. INNER TURF (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTION AL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred )(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FANNIE AND FREDDIE was hustled to the front, dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, showed the way on an easy lead down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, was asked in the two path into the stretch, came under a right-handed crop at the furlong marker and proved best under steady urging. TONED UP went three then two wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the far turn, was asked inside the three-eighths, spun three wide into the stretch under a right-handed crop, lost touch with the winner into the final furlong and was outfinished while able to get the place. SIGNAL FROM NOISE bumped with a foe at the start, was taken under a tight hold early then rated just off the pace on the inside, drafted behind the leader on the far turn, was asked at the quarter-pole then shifted to the two path, dropped in near the three-sixteenths, chased into the final furlong and weakened. AMANI'S IMAGE bumped with a rival at the start, became keen on the opening straightaway then was taken under tight restraint off heels, was taken up briefly early on the first turn, rounded that bend in the two path, settled more comfortably down the backstretch, was roused three wide on the far turn and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Amani's Image
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,keen off heels,tkn up brief,2p1st,settled,ask3p2nd,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Toned Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Bouchey Steven and America's Pastime Stables

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALYS BEACH chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong taking narrow command a sixteenth out, came out two paths under a left handed crop with seventy yards to go to trade a bump with LIFE TALK in the shadow of the wire and gamely held on to prevail. LIFE TALK shied in at the start and was taken hold of conceding three to four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased three wide down the backstretch and then went five wide through the turn advancing under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, tucked four wide at the five-sixteenths, went five wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge a furlong from home, came in under an active left rein three paths once clear of MUGEN to look the aforementioned foe in the eye seventy yards from home, traded a bump just outside the finish line fighting gamely but missed at the end. MUGEN broke in at the start bumping WASKESIU into PHANTASMICAL and in turn into ICE COLD, showed the way in hand just off the inside under pressure from RINGY DINGY to the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat from flanking challengers and was collared a sixteenth out, ran on clear for the show honors. WASKESIU shied in at the start then got bumped by MUGEN into PHANTASMICAL, chased along the inside in closest aim of the top pair coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung just off the inside into upper stretch, got flashed the crop to the left side while weakening in the late stages. RINGY DINGY prompted four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. ICE COLD broke out at the start, then got bumped by PHANTASMICAL due to pressure outside begun by MUGEN and was carried into the bend of the clubhouse turn, extracted herself and conceded three to four lengths to the front before settling to chase along the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. ALAMO broke in at the start bumping JUST MUSIC, chased five then four wide, came under coaxing briefly three wide at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. JUST MUSIC bumped at the start by ALAMO who broke inwards, chased five wide until tucked two to three wide half a mile from home, then went four wide through the turn and four to five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. PHANTASMICAL broke out at the start and was bumped by WASKESIU due to pressure from MUGEN and got knocked back inwards into ICE COLD and then carried that foe in to the bend of the clubhouse turn, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide for home and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Cold
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, bumped st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Phantasmical
ENTRY.OWNER: Alpha Delta Stables LLC and Colts Neck Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, bumped, chased 2-3w, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Waskesiu
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in, bumped st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Mugen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, in hand 2p, under pressure, 2w 1/4p, collared 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Life Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in, steady st, 3w early,5-4w turn, 5w uppr, trade bump,game

ENTRY.NAME: Alys Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4, up 1/16, traded bump, game

ENTRY.NAME: Ringy Dingy
ENTRY.OWNER: Callahan Peter J and McDonald James Reiley

ENTRY.NAME: Just Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 5w, to 2-3w 1/2p, 4w turn, 4-5w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Alamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3w 5/16, 4w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 104. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 20 23 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Hors es Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JERRY THE NIPPER angled in while showing early speed, went around the opening bend in the three path, stalked the pace on the outside, made a bid while thre then two wide on the far turn, gained the lead into upper stretch, drifted out while battling with the runner-up inside the furlong marker, dueled with that foe to the wire and gamely prevailed. KURAMATA (IRE) brushed with a rival at the start, was rated just off the pace on the inside, shifted to the three path late on the far turn, gained to make a bid into upper stretch, dueled outside of the winner in the final furlong and was denied while clear for the place. EASTER (FR) was last to commence, became rank in the three path on the first turn, continued bit rank early on the backstretch then was reserved on the outside, moved from three to five wide on the far turn, came eight wide into upper stretch and finished with late energy for the show. STARTING OVER brushed with a foe at the start, saved ground while reserved under restraint near the back, spun off the rail into the stretch then dropped in some and improved for the last spot in the superfecta. MAIN EVENT angled in while going to the front, rounded the first turn in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, was asked along the rail on the far turn, lost the advantage into upper stretch, dropped back under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. UNANIMOUS CONSENT (GB) bumped with a rival early, saved ground on the first turn, was rated off the pace, raced inside on the far turn, shifted three wide into the stretch then tipped out more and lacked the needed response. CHULAINN broke out at the start, bumped with rivals early, was reserved in the two to three path, shifted five wide late on the far turn, came seven wide into upper stretch and failed to rally. FIELD PASS was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, brushed with a foe early then was pulled off that opponent, was carried out into the first turn, dropped to the four then three path on that bend, settled off the pace, was urged in the two path on the far turn then driven five wide into upper stretch and also failed to rally. GRAND SONATA traveled three wide around the first turn, settled on the outside, was urged along while moving from three to five wide on the far turn and failed to threaten. DOMINICAN PIONEER bumped with a foe at the start, bumped with another rival early then became very rank, was taken up while very hard to control into the first turn, went four to five wide on that bend, settled on the outside, was urged along late on the backstretch, went three to four wide on the far turn, came six wide into upper stretch and faltered.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: St. Elias Stable, LLC & Peta Ryan

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEFTEMBEHIND broke out at the start and then got pinched out between foes under coaxing, chased three wide into the first turn and altered out four wide when a wall of foes in front buckled from solid bumps due to pressure from CATTANI outside seven and a half furlongs from home, chased four then five wide and got floated out seven wide at the three-eighths when caught outside an easing up RULE BREAKER and was placed to coaxing near the five-sixteenths, angled in to swing five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, then edged clear under a drive to prevail. MUDVILLE NINE coaxed from the gate, got brushed at the seven and a half at the end of a chain of solid bumps and leans begun by CATTANI, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took over command with five-sixteenths to go and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared just inside the eighth pole, ran on to secure the place honors clear of the rest. JUST FOR LUCK coaxed from the start, raced six then five wide through the opening dog legged turn, chased two to three wide down the backstretch and through the far turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a bid to the furlongs grounds, kept on to the finish. ATLANTA'S ACUNA hustled from the gate, got bumped solidly between foes with seven and a half furlongs to run and squeezed out IMPULSIVE SPENDING and bumped STRATEGYFORYOU sideways due to pressure outside from RULE BREAKER and CATTANI, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home and weakened. CATTANI hustled from the start, raced six paths off the inside briefly before tucking five wide and brushing RULE BREAKER, had that rival shy in and bumped foes solidly inside down through to MUDVILLE NINE along the rail, chased two to three wide down the backstretch and then four to five wide through the far turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, tired, and was eased through the final furlong to the finish. STRATEGYFORYOU coaxed from the start, got bumped solidly by ATLANTA'S ACUNA in a chain of bumping and was briefly knocked sideways before brushing MUDVILLE NINE, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, yielded the front with five-sixteenths to go, took the inside route into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish. IMPULSIVE SPENDING coaxed from the gate, raced three wide when bumped solidly between foes and squeezed out with seven and a half furlongs to run, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and eased home to the finish. FORWARD CAST coaxed from the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and was eased home to the wire. RULE BREAKER hustled from the start, got brushed by CATTANI and came inwards bumping ATLANTA'S ACUNA solidly into IMPULSIVE SPENDING starting a chain of solid bumps down through MUDVILLE NINE, chased four wide and then went six wide through the far turn getting placed to a protective hold, went ten to eleven wide into upper stretch and was eased up before being pulled up in the stretch, then walked off under his own power. Please note due to a technical error, the seven-eighths split was omitted pending review.

ENTRY.NAME: Mudville Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, brushed 7 1/2, ins, up 5/16, 2w 1/4p, caught, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Forward Cast
ENTRY.OWNER: McCormack E Siobhan and Byrnes Gregory A
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Strategyforyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped solidly 7 1/2, in hand ins, yield 5/16, ins 1/4, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Impulsive Spending
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo and God's Glory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, bump btw, squeezed 7 1/2, ins, ins 1/4, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Leftembehind
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, pinched st, chased 4-5w, 7w 3/8, 5w uppr, up, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Atlanta's Acuna
ENTRY.OWNER: Valente, Roddy J. and Bilinski, Darlene
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, bumped betw 7 1/2, chased 3-4w, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Rule Breaker
ENTRY.OWNER: Schubert R Allen and Portilla Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed, bumped foe 7 1/2, 4w, 10-11w 1/4, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Cattani
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, 6-5w 1st trn, brushed foe 7 1/2, 3w, 4-5w 3/8, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Just for Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 6-5w 1st turn, chased 2-3w, 2w 1/4p, bid, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Bowling Green S. - Grade2 SARATOGA RACE 9 1 3/8M Inner turf CR: 115. Stakes Purse 250000. INNER TURF FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHANNEL MAKER broke in and bumped with a foe then was hustled to the front, was well rated while setting the pace on the inside, responded well when asked on the final turn, came under the crop in upper stretch and held sway under strong urging. VERSTAPPEN was rated just off the pace on the inside under a snug hold, drafted behind the pacesetter on the final turn, shifted to the two path while asked at the quarter-pole, chased under a drive into the final furlong then lugged in towards the rail and narrowly earned the place while unable to reach the winner. NEVER EXPLAIN went two then three wide on the first turn, was rated outside without cover passing the grandstand for the first time, dropped in to get cover near the wire, went three wide on the second turn, continued near the middle of the field on the backstretch, was roused four wide on the third turn, chased the winner under a drive in the stretch and just missed the place while clear for the show. DAUNT was rated just off the pace on the outside in the three path without the benefit of cover, came under urging between rivals in the three path on the final turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. TAWNY PORT stalked the pace on the outside in the two path, was asked between foes on the final turn, had REBEL'S ROMANCE clip his heels at the five-sixteenths, chased under a drive into the final furlong and tired. HIGHEST HONORS was taken in hand early, moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, was reserved towards the back, went three wide on the final turn, steadied to avoid the spill at the five-sixteenths, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. SOLDIER RISING (GB) dropped from the three path to the rail while placed under tight restraint on the opening bend, was reserved well back while saving ground, bumped very hard with REBEL'S ROMANCE after that foe clipped heels at the five-sixteenths then checked very sharply and lost all chance. THE GREY WIZARD (IRE) was bumped at the start and forced in then taken up some, dropped well behind the rest of the field, saved ground while lagging at the rear, checked sharply behind the spill outside the five-sixteenths, came out into upper stretch and was no factor. REBEL'S ROMANCE (IRE) was reserved off the pace while inside to the two path, clipped heels midway through the final turn then stumbled badly and was bumped hard while losing the rider then was walked off after being apprehended by an outrider. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE SPILL ON THE FINAL TURN, THERE WAS NO CHANGE MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH. SOLDIER RISING RAN FOR PURSE-MONEY ONLY

ENTRY.NAME: Verstappen
ENTRY.OWNER: Andrew Farm For the People Racing Stable LLC and Windmill Manor Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Soldier Rising (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael Bailey Morris Wonder Stables and Caruso Michael

ENTRY.NAME: The Grey Wizard (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Frassetto Albert
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,forcd in,tkn up,well behind,ins,chckd sharply5/16,trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Channel Maker
ENTRY.OWNER: Wachtel Stable Barber Gary R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of MEY

ENTRY.NAME: Daunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off pace 3path,ask btwn 3rd turn,chased,weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Ste wards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE PRANKSTER coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide, advanced on the front taking command five-sixteenths from home, spun three wide into upper stretch, went clear under light urging and then finished the final sixteenth hands and heels only to prevail comfortably at the end. RISK FREE coaxed from the start, raced along the inside just off the heels of ARRASOU under a firm hold early on, tipped two to three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to just get up for the place honors in the very last jump. ARRASOU chased along the inside down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick just getting nailed in the last stride for the place honors. FRAU DIABLO showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, yielded the front just inside five-sixteenths to run, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. BROOKLYN GIRLEE coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. MATERIAL WITNESS broke out at the start and was corrected, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide for home and weakened in the stretch. QUIESCENT chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. RIVIERE chased just off the inside until tucked inside at the half mile pole, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, tired. ALLEGEDLY chased just off the inside down the backstretch before going five then six wide through the turn, went six wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Risk Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, firm hold ins early, 2-3w turn, 6w upper, belatedly
